H0.text: Which band started life as 'Feedback' and then became 'The Hype' before settling on their current name. The Script

H1.text: Which band started life as 'Feedback' and then became 'The Hype' before settling on their current name. Kodaline

H2.text: Which band started life as 'Feedback' and then became 'The Hype' before settling on their current name. The Coronas

H3.text: Which band started life as 'Feedback' and then became 'The Hype' before settling on their current name. U2

A4.text: The remaining five members settled on the name 'Feedback' for the group because it was one of the few technical terms they knew.

A5.text: In March 1978, the group changed their name to 'U2', selecting it from a list of six options suggested by Steve Averill, a punk rock musician with the Radiators from Space and a family friend of Clayton.
